content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you schedule an appointment for electrical, plumbing, or HVAC work. Can I have your name to get started?
Thank you, George. May I please have the address where you'd like service?
It's 12 maple - wait, no, uh, Maple... I just moved and can't remember the ZIP... um... maybe 20110? Or is it 21010? Sorry, I can't quite remember right now.
No problem, George. Could you please double-check your full address, including the city and ZIP code, so I can confirm we have the correct information for your appointment?
Look, I have memory issues, and I can't find my paperwork right now. Just 'Maple Lane'... um, maybe Main Street? It's somewhere near the old grocery store downtown. That's all I know.
Thank you for your patience, George. I’m having trouble confirming your address. Let me get a team member to help you further.
reason: AI unable to gather valid address. Needs human assistance.

content: Hi George, this is Judy with XYZ Home Services. I understand it's tough to remember a new address—would it help if I looked it up for you using your old grocery store’s location? If you know any landmarks or a neighbor’s address nearby, that could also help me find you!
